modName: Serenade-Standalone Follower UUNP CBBE TBBP  UNP Slim CBBE Slim
summary:
A completely standalone
female follower.
UUNP Body,UUNP HDT,CBBE TBBP
UNP HDT Slim,CBBE TBBP Slim
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][b][font=Georgia][size=4][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84852-0-1500450334.jpg[/img]
If YOU like this mod then [color=#ffd966]please [/color][/size][/font][/b][b][size=4][color=#ffd966]Endorse and Vote! [/color]
[/size][/b][b][size=4]The [color=#ffd966]endorsement and Vote helps[/color] much more than you might think.[/size][/b]
[/font][font=Georgia]
[b][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#ffe599][/color][/size][size=3][color=#fff2cc]☆[/color][/size] [font=Georgia][b][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#ffe599]Skyrim SE version[/color][color=#ffe599] [/color][color=#f4f4f4]can be executed after installing[/color][/size][color=#ffe599][size=3] XPMSSE, FNIS.[/size][/color][/font][/b][/font][size=3]☆[/size][color=#ffe599][size=3][/size][/color][/font][/b]
[b][size=4]This mod adds female Noard follower, [/size][/b][b][size=4]'Serenade' [color=#ffe599]to your Skyrim game
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85395-0-1500819885.jpg[/img]
[/color][/size][/b][/font][b][size=4][color=#ffe599][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85395-0-1500659020.jpg[/img][/color][/size][/b][font=Georgia][b][size=4][color=#ffe599]
[/color][/size][/b][/font][b][font=Georgia][color=#f1c232][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85395-1-1500386829.jpg[/img][/color][/font][/b][size=5][size=5]
[/size][b][font=Georgia][color=#f1c232]SEREN[/color][/font][/b][b][font=Georgia][color=#f1c232]ADE[/color][/font][/b][/size][b][size=4][color=#ffe599][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85395-0-1500558831.jpg[/img][/color][/size][/b][/center][center][size=5][size=5][b][font=Georgia][color=#f1c232]
[/color][/font][/b][/size][/size][color=#32cd32][font=Georgia][b][color=#e06666][size=4]Follower Info[/size][/color]
[/b][/font][/color][size=3][font=Georgia][b][color=#ffd966]- Name :[/color] Serenade
[color=#ffd966]- Race :[/color] Noard race
[color=#ffd966]- Sex :[/color] [color=#f4f4f4]Female[/color]
[color=#ffd966]- Age :[/color] 21
[color=#ffd966]- Combat Style :[/color] Serenade battle
[color=#ffe599]- [color=#ffd966]Armor :[/color][/color] Osare Culort Outfit - UNP by anano 
                                                            ROSEN SPIN - CBBE LUSH Gear SetA Pack (LoversLab)
[color=#ffd966]-- Location :[/color][color=#ffe599] [/color][color=#ffffff]Temple of  Kynareth ,Whiterun Around
Tuesday and Thursday Riverwood The Sleeping Giant Inn
[color=#ff0000][size=2][color=#ea9999](If you do not find her, wait until the dawn in the Temple of  Kynareth )
[youtube]GrfJZJQiKBA[/youtube][youtube]1i3gYqr2VHU[/youtube][youtube]oh1FIZHQ3A0[/youtube][youtube]mycCOGlz7b4[/youtube]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85395-2-1500386829.jpg[/img][/color]
[/size][/color][/color][/b][/font][/size][b][color=#ffffff][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85395-1-1500359210.jpg[/img][/color][/b][size=3][font=Georgia][b][color=#ffffff]
[/color][color=#ffd966]- Body Style : [/color]UUNP,CBBE TBBP,UNP SLIM,CBBE TBBP SLIM[/b][/font][/size][/center][center][font=Georgia][font=Tahoma][color=#ff0000][size=4][font=Georgia][color=#e06666][b]Requirements[/b][/color][/font]
[/size][/color][/font][b][color=#ffffff][size=3]HDT Physics Extension by HydrogensaysHDT[/size]
[/color][/b][size=3][b][color=#ffffff]SKSE by Ian Patterson, Stephen Abel and Paul Connelly
[/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#ffd966][b]UUNP NonBBP Mod is [size=5]STANDALONE[/size] which means[/b]
[/color][/size][size=4]no other Mods will be required.[/size]
[size=4]You can [/size][size=4]install her with no problems[/size]

[size=4][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85395-2-1500359210.jpg[/img][/size]
